clientDocumentation.title: Documentation
clientDocumentation.subtitle: Complete guide to using the devtechly platform

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: Welcome to the devtechly platform documentation. This guide will help you understand and use all available features for clients.

dashboard.title: Personalized Dashboard
dashboard.desc: Access a comprehensive dashboard with all your important information in one place.

tickets.title: Ticket Management
tickets.desc: Create and manage your support tickets to get help quickly and efficiently.

account.title: Account Management
account.desc: Modify your personal information, password, and account preferences.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.intro: The dashboard is your main entry point into the application. It gives you an overview of your activities.

access.title: Access the Dashboard
access.desc: After logging in, you will be automatically redirected to your dashboard. You can also access it via the navigation menu.

overview.title: Overview
overview.desc: The dashboard displays your main statistics: number of tickets, payment status, recent notifications, etc.

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.desc: Use the side menu to navigate between different sections: tickets, payments, contact, documentation.

tickets.title: Ticket Management
tickets.intro: Tickets allow you to communicate with the support team to resolve your issues or ask questions.

open.title: Open the Form
open.desc: Click the 'Create Ticket' button on the tickets page or use the side menu to access the tickets section.

fields.type: Ticket type: select the appropriate category
fields.description: Description: describe your problem or question in detail
fields.backoffice: Backoffice information: if necessary, provide the URL, login, and password
fields.image: Image: you can attach a screenshot to illustrate your problem

submit.title: Submit the Ticket
submit.desc: Review your information and click 'Create' to submit your ticket. You will receive a confirmation email.

manage.title: Manage Your Tickets
manage.intro: Once created, you can track and manage your tickets:

features.view: View all your tickets with their current status
features.status: Track status changes: New, In Progress, Resolved, etc.
features.messages: Exchange messages with the support team
features.filter: Filter your tickets by status or date

account.title: Account Settings
account.intro: Manage your personal information and account settings.

access.title: Access Settings
access.desc: Click on your name in the top right menu, then select 'Profile' or 'Settings'.

edit.title: Edit Information
edit.desc: Modify your personal information: name, email, phone, address, etc. Make sure the information is up to date.

save.title: Save Changes
save.desc: Click 'Save' to save your changes. You will receive a confirmation.

password.title: Change Password
password.intro: For security reasons, it is recommended to change your password regularly.
password.warning: Make sure to use a strong password with at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

payment.title: Payment Management
payment.intro: Manage your payment methods and track your transactions.

access.title: Access Payments
access.desc: Use the side menu to access the 'Payments' or 'Payment Methods' section.

methods.title: Manage Payment Methods
methods.desc: Add, modify, or delete your payment methods. You can save multiple cards or bank accounts.

process.title: Make a Payment
process.desc: Select a payment method, enter transaction details, and confirm. You will receive a receipt by email.

contact.title: Contact Administration
contact.intro: Use the contact form to communicate directly with the administrative team.

access.title: Access the Form
access.desc: Click 'Contact Administration' in the side menu to access the contact form.

form.title: Fill out the Form
form.desc: Fill out the form with your name, email, subject, and message. Be as specific as possible for a quick response.

response.title: Receive a Response
response.desc: The administrative team will respond to you by email as soon as possible, usually within 24-48 hours.

help.title: Need Additional Help?
help.content: If you have questions or encounter problems, don't hesitate to contact us. Our team is here to help you!
